titleText: Amazon Plays Catch Up in a Corner of the Cloud Where it Lagged
mainText: Amazon.com Inc.'s cloud unit dominates the market for computing power delivered over the internet. But there's one area where it has lagged: artificial intelligence tools that let customers parse data, understand speech and recognize images.

titleText: Samsung SDS wins Seoul blockchain order
mainText: Samsung SDS has won an order from the Seoul city government to draw up a roadmap to apply blockchain for administrative use. Seoul plans to first apply blockchain in municipal duties that actively collect private information.
